definitions.text:
Proselyte
 A new convert some religion or religious sect, or some particular opinion, system or party. Thus a Gentile converted Judaism is a proselyte; a pagan converted christianity is a proselyte; and we speak familiarly of proselytes the theories of Brown, of Black, or of Lavoisier. The word primarily refers converts some religious creed.PROS'ELYTE,
To make a convert some religion, or some opinion or system.
